title: Ticket #1461: condor tools can't act upon condor_kbdd
description:
The condor tools are unable to act upon the kbdd daemon:

condor_restart -subsystem kbdd
ERROR "Unknown daemon type (7) in Daemon::init" at line 1007 in file daemon.cpp
check_ins: 2010-Jun-16 14:30   Check-in [18475]: The kbdd has it's own daemon type, but it is unknown to Daemon::locate so no tools could operate on the kbdd. Added the kbdd to the switch statement in locate, and since it doesn't register with the collector, used NO_AD as the adtype (#1461) (By Robert Rati )
creator: rrati
